tool_description: Get current exchange rates for currency pairs. See more info at https://api-ninjas.com/api/exchangerate.
name: Exchange Rate by API-Ninjas
title: Exchange Rate by API-Ninjas

api_list.name: /v1/exchangerate
api_list.description: API Ninjas Exchange Rate API endpoint.

required_parameters.name: pair
required_parameters.description: Currency pair to query. Must be in the form of **(currency1)_(currency2)** (e.g. **USD_EUR**)
